name: You've bean on my mind
description:
Made for the Valentine's VN Jam 2021 in less than 14 days, as we assembled our lovely little team quite late!

"You've bean on my mind" is a romantic visual novel, with an unusual gameplay element. Try it out for yourself, keep your hand ready on WASD, and let us know if you'd like to see more chapters, content and overall polish added to the game!

Credits:
Story and script by Angelinesei - @angelinesei
Logo and portraits by Emmy (naska) toyonaga - @etoyonaga
Coding, sprites and backgrounds by Wouter van Vugt - wvv-games.com

Voice acting by:

Shishishiena - shishishiena.com
Wandering Voice Actor - wanderingva.carrd.co
Clover Wren - @cloverwrenva
